caption.title: Summary of the number and type of synapomorphic bases for each of the three examined equid genera.

caption.title: A compilation of all 634 putative synapomorphic sites in the mitochondrial genome for Hippidion, Haringtonhippus, and Equus (A), with a comparison to the published MS272 mitochondrial genome sequence at the 140 sites with a base state that matches one of the three genera (B).
